channel.title: Releases on Ace Trace - golf shot tracker
channel.description: Recent content in Releases on Ace Trace - golf shot tracker

item.title: Ace Trace release notes
item.description: 2.7 Redesigned the preview screen 2.5 Made cursor and the line transparent during drag’n’drop and video scrolling 2.3 Added double-tap gesture to reset zoom/cursor position Bug fixes 2.1 New design No plus button - just move the cursor to update the line Quicker access to the distance editor - the icon in the toolbar 2.0 Purchase options Made sign-in optional Added video bundle purchase options Added free videos New features Allowed to only select certain photos for access Fixed zooming in the editor Allowed to add points outside of the video viewport Added the width gradient setting Redesigned settings and preferences panels
